mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(custid, itemid, cnt, color, size, date) VALUES (#{custid},#{itemid},#{cnt},#{color},#{size}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET custid=#{custid}, itemid=#{itemid}, cnt=#{cnt}, date=NOW() WHERE cartid=#{cartid}
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartid, c.custid, i.itemid,i.image1, i.name , i.price, c.cnt , c.date , (i.price * c.cnt) AS prod_totalprice, c.color, c.size FROM item i INNER JOIN cart c ON i.itemid=c.itemid INNER JOIN cust cu ON cu.custid = c.custid WHERE cu.custid = #{custid}
